overview.title: Overview
page.title: Pyncer
page.description: Documentation for the Pyncer PHP framework.
page.http-status-404.title: 404 Page Not Found
page.access.title: Access
page.access.description: Facilitate the authorization and authentication of users to access restricted content.
page.access/basic-authenticator.title: Basic Authenticator
page.access/bearer-authenticator.title: Bearer Authenticaor
page.app.title: APP
page.app.description: Handle a request and outputs a response.
page.component.title: Component
page.component.description: Handle generating the body of an HTPP response.
page.container.title: Container
page.container.description: A basic implementation of the PSR-11 Container Interface.
page.core.title: Core
page.core.description: A set of common standalone functions used by various pyncer packages.
page.data.title: Data
page.data.description: Provides a PHP object representation of your database.
page.database.title: Database
page.database.description: Provides a standard interface for working with databases.
page.database/alter-table.title: Alter Table
page.database/conditions.title: Conditions
page.database/create-table.title: Create Table
page.database/delete.title: Delete
page.database/insert.title: Insert
page.database/select.title: Select
page.database/update.title: Update
page.database/functions.title: Functions
page.dotenv.title: Dotenv
page.dotenv.description: A phpdotenv adaptor interface implementation to read and write .env values to constants.
page.exception.title: Exception
page.exception.description: Common exceptions used by Pyncer that all implement a base Pyncer exception interface.
page.http.title: HTTP
page.http.description: An implementation of PSR-7 HTTP Message Interfaces, PSR-15 HTTP Server Request Handlers, and PSR-17 HTTP Factories.
page.i18n.title: I18N
page.i18n.description: Provide translations for content as well as to format data such as dates and numbers to a locale's specification.
page.iterable.title: Iterable
page.iterable.description: Provides a set of iterable objects such as sets and maps to more easily work with data.
page.log.title: Log
page.log.description: An implementation of the PSR-3 Logger Interface.
page.routing.title: Routing
page.routing.description: Links the current HTTP request to a corresponding HTTP response.
page.session.title: Session
page.session.description: Provides a common interface for dealing with user sessions.
page.source.title: Source
page.source.description: Used for specifying sources of data such as i18n translations or router pages.
page.unit.title: Unit
page.unit.description: Handles the conversion of units such as length, mass, and file size.
page.utility.title: Utility
page.utility.description: A collection of classes and interfaces, commonly used by other packages.
page.validation.title: Validation
page.validation.description: Used for validating untrusted data such as data posted by a user.
notice.i18n: Non English translations are currently only to demonstrate the ability of the framework and are likely to contain many mistakes. Sorry for the inconvenience.
